website_summaries.verdict: Add a pop of color to your kitchen with this uniquely designed cookware.
pros: The vibrant yellow contrasts well against the wooden handles, adding a touch of uniqueness to your kitchen
The heat-resistant enamel exterior works efficiently on any stove top
The wooden handles can withstand washing without causing damage
The pans wipe clean with ease, but are also dishwasher safe
cons: After a long period, some heat will transfer to the wooden handle

website_summaries.verdict: Arrives with eight stylish pieces intended to provide impressive meals for large gatherings.
pros: Crafted for easy cooking and those that cook a variety of dishes
Unlike other induction cookware brands, these pieces do not scratch easily
We love that the set is dishwasher safe as well
cons: Some customers would prefer better manufacturer information in regards to caring for the product

customer_reviews.title: The bottom of the pot washes out black liquid
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times i washed, the bottom of the pan looks like this, the metal bottom goes black and it is horiible, my order is international order and how to return such big n heavy pots?
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Non stick is right!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are GREAT. They really are non stick heat up fast. The only negative for us is we have a gas stove and the flame and changed the color of the yellow on the bottom and the underneath of the handles. It doesn’t bother us much. We have four kids. So nothing ever stays nice for long. IF you have a gas stove and the color remaining the same on ththe pots bother you... I would maybe keep shopping. Other than that, they look cool and work great! We get a lot of compliments on how unique they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Schuster

customer_reviews.title: They probably need to rethink a few things
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! They are extremely easy to clean. I don’t put them in the dishwasher—but don’t really need to. They pretty much just wipe out—I can’t even emphasize how easy the cleaning goes on them. I’ve used them a little over 6 months. I have two issues though. One is that one of the bamboo handles cracked. I can’t find a way to let the company know that I could use a replacement. Secondly, it would be helpful if the pan lids also fit on the skillets since they don’t come with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of 7

customer_reviews.title: Nope don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 6 months. We have thrown out about 3 already. Stuff sticks to the bottom. They have not held up or lasted like we would have liked. The handles get very hot too. They are pretty but they are no good quality. Not impressed and will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: _ahmsm

customer_reviews.title: It’s even hard to cook good fried eggs
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks to the pan. It’s even hard to cook good fried eggs. I’ve used this only for ~ a month.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! supposedly the ceramic does not stick anything and look at the picture! they have been a disaster. I’m very bored with it 😞
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Cannot stand too much heat even on stove top. Wooden handles are cracking slightly. The bottom metal leave a lot of color.
customer_reviews.author: The Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: They're just simply OK.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for almost a year, and I'd say they're simply OK. The pots are probably the most durable of the set, but the pans are kind of a joke. The lip around the pan isn't very tall, so food ends up spilling out if you try to stir anything too much. They're also very prone to food sticking after a while. The inside of one pan is stained and it's not cleaning off, even with abrasive cleaner. Overall, it's not an amazing set, if you're going to invest some money and get decent cookware, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent pants, just handles are ugly.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is light and ceramic. It works with my induction stove. I’m very disappointed about the handles, the handles are painted to imitate the look of wood. Instead of trying to imitate the look of wood which is very tacky, just color them. I usually hang my handles so no holes to hang the pans and in addition the lids don’t fit as snug as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Pots handles gets dangerously hot
customer_reviews.text: Pots handles gets dangerously hot. Paint peels extremely fast. I Do not recommend this product. It looks pretty, however it is not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: caromar720

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy to clean, but be careful not to burn your hand
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we love this cookware set. It is amazingly easy to clean. There are several features you should know about, however. The way the handles join the pans, it is very easy to grab the hot metal, rather than the cool plastic. One of us got a second degree burn this way. The lip of the pans isn't level. It's higher opposite the handle to make flipping food more effective. This interferes with putting a lid on the pan and takes a bit of getting used to. It works with our Bosch induction cooktop, but requires higher settings than other pans we have.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: This set is the best cookware set I’ve ever owned, they are sooooo pretty, and incredibly easy to clean. I always hand clean them to protect the wooden handles, and it’s so easy too, a soft sponge and a bit of dish soap would do just perfectly. I have used them for 2 months now, clean as new. The one pot I use the most has some brown stains at the bottom that don’t come off, I don’t think they bother me at all because you can’t tell unless you check the bottom. I would totally recommend this set, super pretty, easy to clean, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Sjoberg

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss. Awesome ceramic pieces
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Durable. Heavier than I thought. Wish the frying pans came with lids. I’d pay extra
customer_reviews.author: Number 1 Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Like the design and color. Good product but pan bottom gets rusty after using dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Overall quite happy with the quality and color of the set. I got the set in yellow and I’ve used it for a few weeks now. Easy to clean and the quality of paint and design is great. Only thing I find it a bit annoying is after you put it in the dishwasher, the bottom of the pans are somehow rusted, so when you use it the next time, you need to be careful not to touch the bottom or re-clean it, otherwise your hands get all the rust. But if you hand wash them it’s not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Great Pans
customer_reviews.text: Overall awesome product with some minor issues. Though the are sold as dishwasher safe, you will want to avoid putting them in one due to the wooden handles. Wood and dishwashers does not mix. As others have said, the handles do get hot on the pots, but that is kind of normal for most pots. Cleanup is a breeze. Very easy to wash by hand. I do wish the frying pans came with a lid. Went to ikea to get glass lid covers to resolve. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Will Hellme

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t try to touch the handles while cooking, it will burn your fingers pretty bad. Trying to hold the lid is not ideal either. It looks very pretty but unfortunately after couple months it got stained and no matter what I use to clean, I still have those brown stains here and there. At first it was so smooth to cook anything but 3-4 months later, food started to stick on it. Overall, looks pretty but not so functional and not going to last so long.
customer_reviews.author: Seporet

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight pans! My parents needed new pans so I gave them as a gift. I've also cooked with them at their house and they are easy to clean and good to cook with. The pans themselves are very light, but durable so far. They look so cute! I love the bright yellow outside. You can easily use them as a serving dish. The handles look like wood, but it's coated with something that looks like wood so they can be used in the oven too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for even induction cooking...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the skillet first and found it was the most even cooking on our induction range of all our other pots and pans. I love the color and the wood look comfortable handles. It was so attractive and well designed, I bought the entire set and gave away the other copper clad pans that were supposed to have been permanent non-stick, but failed after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kenno

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price and more.
customer_reviews.text: This set of pots and pans are truly great. I was a little skeptical about it. After reading the comments on some. But I went ahead and ordered the set. It nice to cook and not have to worry about food sticking to the pans. They heat great I turn them down once it starts to boil and it cools amazing. Easy to clean and I store my pots and pans back in the bubble wrap because I don't want to damage them. I would recommend this set to any one. Worth the money and the time great. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up. non stick doesn't last. Handles get extremely hot.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for one year, at this point. It has not held up. The non-stick coating stopped working about 2 months in, despite proper care insteuctions being followed. Even with oil in the pan, everything sticks. EVERYTHING. The handles get very hot and I have to use pot holders. I've burned my hands on the exposed screws on the underside of the handles. It's a cute looking set, but poorly made and won't last. Save your money. Spend it elseware.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Well priced set for induction stoves.
customer_reviews.text: I have an induction stove and pots & pans for it are normally expensive. I’ve spent $80 on just a frying pan. So this set is very reasonably priced. Having said that I have a couple of issues with them, although I have learned to work around them. They are lightweight and they get very hot extremely fast. I can’t cook on a high setting with them because the food burns. But it doesn’t stick! So I cook on medium heat. Also the wooden handles get hot, I keep a pot holder nearby. I would still recommend this set. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tormo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these pans.
customer_reviews.text: First things first, I live they are a safer product to cook on. They are also pretty!! These are super non-stick and have held up wonderfully in the dishwasher. My only complaint is I’d like to have a bigger skillet. I make due but at times it be nice to have a big skillet! These really are fantastic ifbyou just take care of them and don’t use metal utensils anywhere near them.
customer_reviews.author: Main guy

customer_reviews.title: Best pots and pans I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the ceramic set. Non stick is the best I’ve ever used- so easy to wipe down and clean. No scrubbing required, even after daily use for one month. Plus they’re so pretty! I’ve gotten tons of compinents on my new purchase. Can’t beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Junk !
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on these pots and pans! All the food sticks to the pans and the pot handles are a Joke because they get too hot to use I threw the whole set in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I have a gas stovetop, it turned the yellow bottom on the pans brown. They lost their “nonstick” after a month or so. I have since replaced them with other cookware.
customer_reviews.author: selcouth

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I both love them already
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these and have been using them for a few days. My husband and I both love them already! They are what everyone said they were...easy to clean and things like eggs slip right off the pan when cooking. Absolutely fantastic! We love the look of them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!!! They are very lightweight, so easy to clean, everything cooks evenly, and especially the beautiful color. My mom loves her heavy cast iron pan, but I’m going to send her a set of these anyway. I’m pretty sure that she won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: xposr63

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: Color is great and the pans/pots themselves are great too cook with. Non-stick surface works great. The handles are comfortable to hold and I like the wood look. The only thing I would wish for would be glass lids so I can look inside without removing but regardless I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gross

customer_reviews.title: Attractive overall set
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great quality set, looks well built. Heats up quickly/evenly. Good non-stick properties. Very good looking color/set. Cons: Handles gets hot in time. If you don't use a lot of oil, it can be a pain to clean sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: vishal rana

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous and lasts, but that’s about it. It’s been a year since I purchased and the non-stock functionality is almost gone. Things used to slide off, now food sticks to all parts of the pans. We do treat with olive oil regularly, but that hasn’t helped too much.
customer_reviews.author: Leia P.

customer_reviews.title: The best induction cookware you can buy at any price.
customer_reviews.text: This excellent ceramic cookware is nonstick, heats uniformly, and is easy to clean. It’s oven compatable to at least 350oF, but should never be used on a regular cooktop or range. I use mine everyday, and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Bouvier

customer_reviews.title: Sadly you should pick another set of pots and pans.
customer_reviews.text: After returning the first set bc of black residue rubbing off the bottom I was disappointed when my second set did the exact same thing. My white cabinet interior has the black stuff all over it now. To top it off the reviews that say they’re easy to clean are fascinating bc I’m having no luck! They have burn marks that don’t come off unless I use an abrasive, after that the non stick surface is gone so they are useless. I do tend to cook hot but I’ve never experienced this..... most are in the trash now. Too bad bc they were so cute
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Works with induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for our RV and I love them. They are easy to clean and we have not had any issues with them. They work well on the induction cooktop. We even ordered the cooking utensil set in the same color to match. We are very pleased and the price was right. Picture was taken after FIFTEEN months of contunuous use! Still pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Unicoi

customer_reviews.title: Clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pots and pans. The skillets make it easy to flip something now. I use these all the time. Clean up is a breeze and I like that it has metal bottom which enables me to use on my glass top stove. I threw out all my other pots. Only wish I had a couple smaller ones like pint, qt, and 1.5 qt. These are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnston7

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: They’re awesome. Careful, they burn really bad considering the handles don’t reach all the way to the end before getting to the pot itself and the handles get very hot as well. Other than that they’re fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute... From afar. The paint job is sloppy at best. I am not really sure how it will hold up overtime as some people have been reporting fading of the color. But wow the paint job is a mess, parts that aren't meant to be yellow are yellow, and there is clear undercoating and runny paint marks. When cooking it is easy to clean and all, but at this price point you would wish for a better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Vermi pan set
customer_reviews.text: wish lids were included for each pan, glass lids would be nice to see thru. Beautiful pans really even heat, super clean up, holds heat to keep foods hot, I really love them great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I needed to for these pans. I did TONS of research on what pans I wanted to buy and ended up going with these. Not only are they adorable but they work SO incredibly well. Completely non stick and washes beautifully in the dishwasher as well as by hand. I did have the smallest sauce pan with a little bit of a loose handle and I reached out to Vremi and their customer service was amazing. I always cook with medium or medium/ low heat because these pans heat up very well. They are also not oven safe which is fine with us!
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: COULDN’T BE HAPPIER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell You enough how awesome these are!!! I have a modern kitchen and they look great when on the stone. The nonstick is ridiculous! Works so well and cleans perfectly. So easy to hand wash. My kids are probably sick of me talking about how much I love my set, but maybe not bc I made them buy them for me for my bday. As well they should bc I cook for them every night in quarantine! Seriously, get them. For 100 bucks it’s the Best Buy I’ve had in years.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans. We cook a lot and make a lot of omelets and pancakes, these pans are perfect and allow for easy flipping with the raised edge. We make potatoes and they don't burn or get stuck to the pan like they do on other pans. The handles are perfect shape and size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: 1 year & overall still love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots & pans and I rave about them to everyone. After nearly on year of use, they have mostly maintained their nonstock and easy-to-clean properties which make them fantastic! The only downside is that the handles have started peeling (a plastic coating layer is flaking off of the handles on the pieces we use most). We only handwash, so that is disappointing as we have to watch that they don’t flake off into our food. But these are still my go-to pots & pans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, but one one of my pans there was some discoloration on the outside after the first use. Not a huge deal and it only happened to one pan. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and terrific seller’s customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A pot had some issues with its coating. We contacted the seller, and the seller’s customer service was way better than I expected! We are so satisfied with the product and the seller’s customer service! I would like to give 100 stars for the seller’s customer service :).
customer_reviews.author: Bokkyu

customer_reviews.title: Best pit and pan set I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don’t like is the metal screw attachments of the handles. They get extra hot and can burn you if you aren’t aware of your finger placement when picking them up. Other than that this is the best set of pots and pans I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Riddius

customer_reviews.title: No information about  PFOA,  PFOS, or Toxic PPE free!!!
customer_reviews.text: I changed my review because I discovered after watched DARK WATERS, that ALL non-stick coating has a toxic chemical called PFOA, PFOS, or Toxic PPE. I emailed the company , I try to reach them to get the information , no answer, so as They dont inform if these pans are free of PFOA, PFOS, and Toxic PPE, I throw away, never will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cookware of My Dreams
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is perfect in every way. When I bought it a couple months ago, I was worried that something would go wrong, as I had never heard of this brand and I found it hard to believe that these pots and pans could be so CUTE and also work as well as they do! They still look brand new, even after all the times my food has boiled over and burned under the pots. They are incredibly easy to clean, crap just slides right off without much scrubbing. I also love that they are oven and dishwasher safe! You can bet I'll be looking for more kitchen products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Cleans SO Easily.  Truly non-stick!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are awesome. They are TRULY non-stick. Super easy to clean! and Oven safe. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: I love the sizes
customer_reviews.text: Cute! I love the sizes, perfect for one pot meals. The non-stick really makes cleaning a lot easier. The wooden handles are a nice new look. I bought the yellow set and they definitely brighten up my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Luckey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot remember ever writing a review. I read them before I buy products but don't write them. This product is wonderful. I have used it for a year. We cook meals at least 5 times a week in our home and use these pots and pans. They have held up. I am buying for my daughter a set for Christmas. Actually, she asked for them. She has cooked with them and likes them, too. The switch to porcelain is a great selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great non-toxic and non-stick cookware
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware set. Non-toxic and non-stick, which is hard to find. We've received several compliments on how nice they look. One point on caution: the handles get very hot when on the stove, so always use gloves when handling.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this set. Originally bought it to use with an induction cooktop during a kitchen renovation, but have continued to enjoy this product. They are pretty, easy to clean, and their is a good variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: False
customer_reviews.text: “Vremi's Premium Ceramic Cookware Set likes it hot. How hot you ask? Try 500°F. So yeah, it can take the heat. This adds a completely new layer to your cooking experience. No need to worry about cooking a meal on a pan only to transfer it to a baking sheet. With each piece's oven safe construction and handles, all you gotta do is move it to the oven, let it cook, and enjoy!” = FALSE. Couldn’t even take 400 degrees. Great looking paperweights though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pots
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t have enough great things to say about these products, I’m prettt sure they’re the absolute best pots I’ve ever had! And they’re beautiful looking too! 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: NiaNia

customer_reviews.title: Best pans I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are Amazing!!! The quality is so nice. They are heavy so they heat evenly and hold the heat. Scrambled eggs slid right out of the pan, not even a spot to clean up! Crusted Salmon in butter & olive oil never left a mark either and clean up was SO easy!! Definitely the best pans I have ever had. They are so cute! I love the retro look with the wooden handles, again, great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry archer

customer_reviews.title: "Pan"-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: My roommates and I love these pans! They are super easy to clean and great for cooking a variety of things. The "stew" pots aren't big enough to meal prep for the entire week, but are fabulous for a 4 person dinner. Generally smaller than I expected, but the color and quality is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: I love the bright colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright colors! They are sturdy and solid-feeling. I get that the ceramic should not be part of the handle area, and that is a minus, but not a minus star......I just remember not to grab the handle without using a pot holder. I really do love these!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Silipo

customer_reviews.title: Buy these pans
customer_reviews.text: This pan set is freaking awesome, this is the best set if pans I have ever owned. After for months of use the non stick coating is still like new and cleaning is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron King

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookware!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is absolutely fabulous! I bought a set for my house and loved it so much I bought another set for the RV. It's easy to clean and is actually non-stick! I've had the copper "non-stick" pans and they were a joke... this set is the real deal. My mother commented on how pretty the set was so I just purchased my third set as a housewarming gift for her!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Davis

customer_reviews.title: The best gift to myself!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best cooking pots and pans!!! I promise you will be so satisfied when you buy this! Nothing sticks! I use olive oil and it is the best! In love with my pot set. 😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Fiori

customer_reviews.title: 1yr sticky, 2yr paint chipping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for baking, sucky for cook top, became no longer non stick within a year now after 2 yrs yellow paint is peeling off. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Sean King

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots! they are durable and strong. The only negative, is the handles heat up and get slightly more warm than i would like - otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware. My only tiny complaint is that it doesn't come with a small sauce pan. Otherwise - perfect in all areas. Easy to clean, cooks beautifully, and I love the white interior. Absolutely recommend - 100%.
customer_reviews.author: BluMoose

customer_reviews.title: Can be use on gas stove. Nice pots for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable pots. I have cook a lot of different things in them. I have even fried chicken in the large pot. I cook using a gas stove and the pots didnt burn on the bottom from the flame. I will say that the handles do get hot. The pots are easy to clean. You need to use the proper cooking utensils to keep from scratching the nonstick coating off the pots. Nice pots for the price.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Only Wish It Had a Small Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love ❤️ these pots and pans. They are very high quality. I wish they made a smaller pot to go with the collection. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Cooks super evenly and clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: These pans are both functional and cute! Cooks super evenly and clean up is a breeze! I only gave 4 stars because none of the lids fit the fry pans. My fault for not looking closer at the pictures, but still disappointing
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful set and very responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the lid was missing and I’ve contacted the vermi and their customer service was so responsive and great. Thank you for the great service. The product quality is really good. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lily W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have been using them for 3 months and havent had an issue at all
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans.
customer_reviews.text: These pans cook great, clean up so nice and look AMAZING! They make me so happy to cook and sometimes I serve right out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and they work well!
customer_reviews.text: They are so beautiful and they work amazing! Nonstick and very easy to clean. So far I’ve made Mexican rice, eggs cheese and potatoes, and some soup with veggies. Everything cooked so well and they cleaned super easy. I am very happy with this purchase. They are so pretty to look at!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about a month now, and they are wonderful to cook with! Love the design, and they are really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: raynbowgirl

customer_reviews.title: I pretty much bought these because I’m obsessed with yellow
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much bought these because I’m obsessed with yellow. But they are great quality. Just be careful when you go to grab the handle that you do not grab too close to the pan itself. I made that mistake. Great product though. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These pots & pans are amazing! Nothing sticks to them and you don't even have to add oil of any sort to prevent sticking. They hear evenly and cook evenly and are beautiful to look at as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Buy These
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a chef so he is quite picky about pots and pans and we can't love these more than we do. They are easy to use, easy to clean, cook beautifully, and are gorgeous. If you grab a portable induction cooktop from IKEA and these pans, you won't need your kitchen stovetop anymore. I can't recommend enough! Really, Vremi sells excellent products so I also recommend checking out their other products.
customer_reviews.author: CFunk

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this set. After having them and using them on a regular basis I would not purchase again. The outside of the pots and pans are very difficult to clean, I have a gas grill and it makes marks on them that are now permanent. The handles are NOT heat resistant what so ever. Would not recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuff just flies off of it
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a house with an induction range - our first experience with this type of pan. Cooking eggs, warming soups, anything we use it for cleans out in the sink quick and easy. WE love the lack of scrubbing and easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful_yet_caution

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean! Cooks evenly! Beautiful cookware! Definitely ordering another set...
customer_reviews.author: Anjolie

customer_reviews.title: I love this nonstick cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I love this nonstick cookware set. It cooks my food perfectly and I love the feel of the ceramic pot/pan. The different sizes of pots and pans are perfect for when I have to cook tons of food or just food for one.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C.

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: The very 1st time I used the small sauce pan two chips came off the inside of the pan. Not happy, plus I had to pay more because I wanted the yellow set. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Cooks to fast, burns easily and everything sticks to it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pots so much when I started using them in March 2018, now I hate them. They burn so easily, gravy, gumbo, any thing that has a thick gravy or sauce in them. I am very disappointed, don't waste your money. And the price I see keeps going up.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: awesome, stylish, functional pans!
customer_reviews.text: These pans were everything I had hoped they would be! So cute, so easy to clean, and easy to stack and store. I would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love my teflon free pots!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Teflon free pots. They got here within 2 days. Best purchase I have made on Amazon. It's been three months I have had my pots and they still look new. They cook faster then regular leading brands.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Better to use for soup or stew
customer_reviews.text: I am using them for 5 months so far and I like the color and inside ceramic. When I fry something in pan frier bottom color changed and I can’t erase that. I think it is comfortable to make a soup or stew.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great Nonstick set
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots & pans! Color is very nice. Easy to clean. Non stick is great! Heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cespedes

customer_reviews.title: Best Pans EVer
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas and I LOVE THEM! They are so easy to clean( I've never put them in the dishwasher) Nothing really sticks to them including rice and grits, everything comes right off. I absolutely adore the yellow
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My new love!!! Colors are as bright as the pictures...brilliant yellow. Brightens the kitchen up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty and clean so easily. I hosted a brunch and received many compliments on this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Not non sticky after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Started off well, and that's why I think this product has good reviews. However, it did not last. After less than 10 uses the pan is virtually useless and is more sticky than a wrought iron pan! Don't buy this. Its pretty, but useless as a non stick product.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for almost a year and still non stick. Can’t put them in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Hefner

customer_reviews.title: I can’t say enough good things about these.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is phenomenal and they are super cute to boot! I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Jesse Hussey

customer_reviews.title: I love the pots
customer_reviews.text: I love the pots! The only thing I discovered that I wasn't aware of, is that the handles are not wood. The handles just have a wood print on them...I'm hoping over time this doesn't scratch off.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brown

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous set, easy to clean, great to cook with, great color
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Poulter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Truly non-stick, light in weight, great quality, easy to maintain, and looks amazing. Wish the set would have a sligthly larger pan size. But overall, a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is seriously amazing. Super nonstick and beautiful. Great customer service from the company too!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Beauties!
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful and just what I've been searching for. The yellow color is perfect for my kitchen. They are ceramic, nonstick and I'm 💯% satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware. I do not have an induction stove so I had no issues using these.
customer_reviews.author: Reny

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 20-something and live with other 20-somethings. Pots and pans in my house take a beating. So far, these are wonderful. I don't think I will ever go back from ceramic. They feel very sturdy. No sticking or scratching. Easy to clean. I got the yellow and it's really adorable.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Grey-black goo oozes off bottom of pots and pans with everywash
customer_reviews.text: There are some pics in other reviews, and that's been our experience. The goo even stains the bottom of our pots and pans cupboard. Will replace soon.
customer_reviews.author: carol igoe

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are durable and perfect sizes. They wipe clean after use easily with no sticking during or after cooking. The yellow is soft and light and pretty. I would highly recommend these pans!
customer_reviews.author: Eclark

customer_reviews.title: They are built well and are very sturdy pans. They are a great set
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these as a gift, but once they arrived and I looked at them, decided to keep them for myself. They are built well and are very sturdy pans. They are a great set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny, prevent having any burnt in every cooking we been made so far. thank you
customer_reviews.author: James017

product_meta.title: Vremi 8 Piece Ceramic Nonstick Cookware Set Induction Stovetop Compatible Dishwasher Safe Non Stick Pots and Frying Pans with Lids, Yellow and White
product_meta.description:
Meet Vremi’s premium Masterpiece Dinner Ceramic Nonstick Cookware Set. Each part is an aluminum base coated in nonstick ceramic for a sumptuous, scrape-free, evenly heated feast. This pots and saucepan set is induction compatible cookware which you can use on any stovetop burner and with steam release lids for overflow prevention and meal perfection. These kitchen essentials clean up beautifully without lots of effort; no scratching and scrubbing necessary. And with its vibrant colors and modern design, it’s always dressed to impress. Bon Appetit! 

 Product Details & Care 

 * 1 Small Dutch Oven with Lid, Diameter: 8.1 in / 20.5 cm, Capacity: 2.7 liters / 2.85 quarts 
 * 1 Large Dutch Oven with Lid, Diameter: 9.75 in / 24.7 cm, Capacity: 4.7 liters / 4.97 quarts 
 * 1 Shallow Casserole with Lid, Diameter: 10.5 in / 26.7 cm, Capacity: 3.7 liters / 3.9 quarts 
 * 1 Medium Angled Frying Pan, Diameter: 9.4 in / 24 cm, Capacity: 1.2 liters / 1.27 quarts 
 * 1 Large Angled Frying Pan, Diameter: 10.1 in / 25.6 cm, Capacity: 1.6 liters / 1.69 quarts 
 * Die-cast Aluminum body 
 * Nonstick Ceramic coated interior 
 * Heat-resistant Enamel exterior 
 * Bakelite handles and knobs 
 * Non-toxic and BPA Free 
 * Dishwasher Safe 
 * Induction, gas, electric and halogen stovetop compatible 
 * Do NOT use in Oven or Microwave 
 * IMPORTANT: If using with induction stovetop, make sure induction burner diameter does not exceed pan or pot diameter base in order to effectively trigger sensor 
 * CAUTION: Handles may become hot during use. Wear protective gloves or mitts when handling 
 * For full care instructions and safety warnings, always refer to Vremi product box or manual
feature_bullets: COOKWARE MADE for SERVING - This 8 piece ceramic cookware set includes 2 dutch oven pots, 1 casserole pot with lids and 2 angled frying pan skillets for an omelette or crepe, and can go directly from stovetop to table as serverware

CERAMIC COATING for EVEN HEATING - This pot and pan set is made of a durable and non-toxic die-cast aluminum body with a nonstick ceramic coated surface that heats quickly and evenly and releases food easily with no scraping
MODERN with STEAM RELEASE DESIGN - Features bakelite ergonomic wood tone handles for easy tossing and turning and lids that have small gap between lid and body for mess free steam release and cooking

INDUCTION STOVETOP FRIENDLY - Each piece has an induction-compatible spiral bottom to work on gas, electric or halogen stove top (IMPORTANT: For induction, burner diameter should not exceed pan or pot diameter base. NOT oven safe)

DISHWASHER SAFE - Clean the cookware set in the dishwasher or hand wash with soap and always keep the cookware dry after cleaning. Discoloration may occur on the bottom of the pans after long term use or repeat washing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars637 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
